column5: Rent my house for Super Bowl 2017! Close to George Bush Intercontinental, about a 30 minute drive to downtown and about 45 minutes or so to NRG Stadium. I live in a quiet neighborhood, close to numerous restaurants, shopping, IH-69. I'll put more pictures up later, my house is currently getting some repairs done. (New floors, roof, paint.)
column8: Book my house for Super Bowl 2017
